title: Kourtney and Khloe Kardashian are Releasing KKW Fragrances With Sister Kim
text:
From Harper's BAZAAR

While our dreams of a KKW fragrance and beauty North West collection still haven't been realized, Kim Kardashian West has decided to keep it in the family for her next collaboration. Sisters Kourtney and Khloe Kardashian are teaming up with the beauty mogul to launch The Diamond Collection, a set of three perfumes, on November 8th.





"Creating the KKW Fragrance Diamonds Collection with Kim and Kourtney was so inspiring. I wanted to create a fragrance that feels feminine, sexy and strong when I wear it.," Khloe wrote on Instagram. "It’s such a dreamy scent with a mix of sweet florals and musk that can be worn from day to night. I’ve been wearing this non-stop and love it more and more every day."

Khloe's perfume is in a pink diamond bottle and described as a floral bouquet. Notes include Italian bergamot, something called Sparkling Pink Puff Violet Accord, tuberose, jasmine, sweet lilac blossom, and musks and woods.



Kourtney's perfume is the yellow diamond, which is meant to smell like daylight and is a sparkling oriental gourmand. Notes include golden currant berries, jasmine, magnolia, iris, vanilla, patchouli, and musk.



"Working with my sisters for this collection was nostalgic. Fragrance is so personal, so being able to create my own scent from start to finish was an exciting experience," Kourtney wrote on Instagram. "I wanted to create a vibrant one that matches my classic, playful vibe. The combination of Golden Berries, Jasmine and Vanilla is refreshing."





The third perfume is a clear and classic white diamond by Kim Kardashian West. Though she now has over a dozen fragrances in her KKW Fragrance line, this new one is a bouquet of white florals. Notes include tropical floral leaves, sugar coated ginger, wild armoise morocco organic, ylang ylang oil cosmors orpur, orange flower absolute orpur, exotic sampaguita blossom, coconut milk cream, and musk.

“This collection is really special because it’s the first fragrance collaboration I’ve done with Kourtney and Khloé for my KKW Fragrance line. Each of the fragrances really capture us individually," says Kardashian West. My scent is fresh and floral but becomes warmer and more sensual as I wear it throughout the day. I can’t wait for you to experience the collection and find your favorite.”

Kardashian West previously collaborate with sister Kylie Jenner on a set of three fragrances, which are now available in all Ulta stores.





The KKW Fragrance Diamond Collection by Kourtney x Kim x Khloé will be available at KKWFragrance.com on Friday, November 8th, 2019 at 12:00PM PST. Each 30ml bottle is $40 and the bundle of all three is $110.





You Might Also Like
description: The Diamond Collection features three new perfumes inspired by each sister.
